main.name: Khalil Dabbah
main.description: I eat, sleep and build projects
main.bio: Hi there! I'm Khalil Dabbah, a Computer Information Systems Student and full-stack developer with a strong passion for building impactful systems and continuously expanding my skills. I’ve worked on a variety of technical projects ranging from backend systems and databases to complete full-stack applications. Along the way, I discovered that I truly enjoy helping others grow and understand complex technical concepts in a simple, practical way. Through sharing knowledge, collaborating on projects, and creating real-world software solutions, I aim to inspire other developers to push beyond their limits and grow professionally. I focus on hands-on learning, real projects, and practical problem-solving to prepare for success in the tech industry. My goal is to keep learning, building, and contributing to meaningful projects that make a real difference.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me and let's connect

work.title: Aspiring Software Engineer
work.description: Actively building software projects through hands-on development, debugging, and iteration. Focused on strong fundamentals and becoming industry-ready.

testimonials.text: Success is a lousy teacher. It seduces smart people into thinking they can’t lose.”
Move fast, break things. Unless you are breaking stuff, you are not moving fast enough.
